welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Saint-Zotique, Canada! This charming city is known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cornwall Regional Airport serves all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cornwall Regional Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, primarily serving regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport after watching a short advertisement.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
